audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear functional optimization of supply chain operations - automated detection and correction improves efficiency of existing processes. Pattern is replicable across other large retailers.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Named organization (Walmart), specific process description, attributed to named executive (Uppuluri). Source appears credible.

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Describes cost improvement through automation but appears to be a general industry estimate rather than Walmart-specific result.

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear operational efficiency initiative - automating store operations represents optimization of existing retail functions.

tier_verification: Mostly correctly classified as tier 1. Claims C7 may be tier 1 (fulfillment services growth suggests new revenue stream). Claims C4 and C10 have attribution issues that need verification.
